titles.title: HP84 On Jordan's bank the Baptist's cry

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
On Jordan's bank the Baptist's cry
announces that the Lord is nigh;
come then and listen for he brings
glad tidings from the King of kings!

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
For You are our salvation, Lord,
our refuge, and our great reward;
without Your grace we waste away,
like flowers that wither and decay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
To heal the sick stretch out Your hand,
make wholeness flow at Your command;
sin's devastation now restore
earth's own true loveliness once more.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
To Him who left the throne of heaven
to save mankind , all praise be given;
to God the Father, voices raise,
and Holy Spirit, let us praise.
